p: Group four consisted of 35 mice. 15 mice were intranasally inoculated with 1.0 × 10 6TCID 50 of either virus in 50 μL of PBS and five were inoculated with equal PBS as a negative control. At 2, 4 and 6DPI five mice inoculated with either V0215 or Y12 virus were killed and lungs were collected for pathology studies and real time PCR. The five mice inoculated with PBS were killed at 6DPI and lungs were collected for pathology studies.
